name: Illusion (itch) (YsaroX)
description:
Will you succeed in trusting an illusion? 

    • Use the keyboard's arrows for slide and jump
    • Be attentive and don't get lost. 

Be careful not to go crazy

░▒▓█▓▒░▒▓█▓▒░▒▓█▓▒░▒▓█▓

░▒▓█▓▒░▒▓█▓▒░▒▓█▓▒░▒▓█▓

This game has been made in less than 2 months by five students from E-artsup Paris in first year of Game-Art and Creative-Coding.

Creative Codings :
  • Aurélien CROUZIER (Programming, UI, Level-Design, Integrations)
  • Alban LOZAC'H (Programming, UI, Integrations, Feedbacks)
Game Artists :
  • Laura BETTINI (Concepts, Texturing, Integrations, Lights and PostProcessing)
  • Yoann MESSANT (Modelisation, Texturing, Integrations)
  • Gustave MOHAMMED (UI, Texturing)

░▒▓█▓▒░▒▓█▓▒░▒▓█▓▒░▒▓█▓
